title.rendered: DIAMONDROCK HOSPITALITY ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2024 EARNINGS RELEASE AND CONFERENCE CALL

content.rendered:
BETHESDA, Md., March 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — DiamondRock Hospitality Company (the “Company”) (NYSE: DRH) will report financial results for the first quarter 2024 after the market closes on Thursday, May 2, 2024. A conference call for investors and other interested parties is scheduled for the next day on Friday, May 3, 2024 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time (ET). The information to be discussed on the call will be contained in the Company’s earnings release, which will be available in the Investor Relations section of the Company’s website at www.drhc.com.

The conference call will be accessible by telephone and through the internet. Interested individuals are requested to register for the call using this link to obtain dial-in and webcast details. Registration details are also available by visiting https://investor.drhc.com. To participate in the webcast, please follow instructions via the links above 15 minutes before the call to download the necessary software.

For those unable to listen to the call live, a replay of the call will be available two hours after completion of the live call for a limited time via the webcast URL: https://edge.media-server.com/mmc/p/kmx68qq6.

About the Company

DiamondRock Hospitality Company is a self-advised real estate investment trust (REIT) that is an owner of a leading portfolio of geographically diversified hotels concentrated in leisure destinations and top gateway markets. The Company currently owns 36 premium quality hotels and resorts with over 9,700 rooms. The Company has strategically positioned its portfolio to be operated both under leading global brand families as well as independent boutique hotels in the lifestyle segment. For further information on the Company and its portfolio, please visit DiamondRock Hospitality Company’s website at www.drhc.com.

SOURCE DiamondRock Hospitality Company

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/diamondrock-hospitality-announces-first-quarter-2024-earnings-release-and-conference-call-302089815.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
